named-query.name: Conversations.byUser
named-query.query: SELECT _converstaion FROM Conversation _converstaion WHERE _converstaion.userA = :userId or _converstaion.userB = :userId and _converstaion.blocked = 'false' ORDER BY _converstaion.timestamp desc

named-query.name: Conversations.byUserBlocked
named-query.query: SELECT _converstaion FROM Conversation _converstaion WHERE _converstaion.userA = :userId or _converstaion.userB = :userId and _converstaion.blocked = 'true' ORDER BY _converstaion.timestamp desc

named-query.name: Conversations.byParticipants
named-query.query: SELECT _converstaion FROM Conversation _converstaion WHERE (_converstaion.userA = :participantA and _converstaion.userB = :participantB) or (_converstaion.userA = :participantB and _converstaion.userB = :participantA) ORDER BY _converstaion.timestamp desc
